text: "Lonesome Day" is a 2002 song by Bruce Springsteen. It is the second single from his 12th studio album The Rising and went to number 39 in the United Kingdom, number 92 in Germany, number 47 in Sweden, number 6 in Spain, number 13 in Italy and number 36 on the Billboard Adult Top 40 chart. == References == Category:2002 songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs Category:Country rock songs
title: Lonesome Day
